snippet.title: Shadow Point - Available Now for Oculus Quest and the Rift Platform
snippet.description:
Shadow Point is a story-driven puzzle adventure VR game set between a mountaintop observatory and an ever-changing fantasy world.

Guided by the journal of Edgar Mansfield, voiced by Sir Patrick Stewart, explore a vibrant kingdom, cast shadows and solve mind-bending puzzles as you uncover the mystery of missing schoolgirl, Lorna McCabe who vanished from Shadow Point Observatory twelve years ago.

🛒: http://bit.ly/ShadowPointQuest
🛒: http://bit.ly/ShadowPointRift

Find out more about Shadow Point:
https://shadowpointgame.com/

🔗Follow us:

Discord: discord.gg/coatsink

Twitter: https://twitter.com/shadowpointgame

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Coatsink/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/coatsink/

🌐 https://coatsink.com/
